articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
our old friend @OlimpioCrypto is right
there are few things that signal that you are a good citizen of Web3 (-> 🪂) as much as supporting the projects being sued by trolls 
let's all pooltogether 🤝
✅ mint a @LensProtocol username
✅ potentially get included in airdrops
olimpio ⚡️: Lens is allowing "PoolNFT" holders to mint lens usernames (snapshot was taken at block 14880593, it already passed so you can’t at the moment)
But they hinted that when the NFTs reach to 769 ETH goal (516 ETH so far) they will take another snapshot
👇
